Get the Community

getCo.Rd

Returns the community of a single MiCo object in a tibble format or a list of communities in tibble format for MiCoAl objects.

Usage

getCo(object)

# S4 method for class 'MiCo'
getCo(object)

# S4 method for class 'MiCoAl'
getCo(object)

Arguments

object

An object of class MiCoAl

Value

A tibble with the community data.

A list with the community data.

Functions

  • getCo(MiCo): Get the Community

  • getCo(MiCoAl): Get the Community

Examples

c1 <- newMiCo(ac_A1R12_1)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ac_A1R12_1' not found
c2 <- newMiCo(ac_A1R12_2)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ac_A1R12_2' not found
a <- newMiCoAl(c1, c2)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'c1' not found

getCo(c1)
#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'getCo': object 'c1' not found
getCo(a)
#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'getCo': object 'a' not found
